title: (x) Poster Gallery headline on dontpanicmedia.com - Lubalin Graph {Dav}
content:
got this headline from dontpanicmedia.com. Looks like a serif version of Avant Garde with a few unique characters. Anyone know what it is?

comments.content: Great! thanks for the quick reply
